title: Exploration of Energization and Radiation in Geospace (ERG) Medium-Energy Particle experiments - electron analyzer (MEP-e) Level 2 3D electron flux data - Satoshi Kasahara (The University of Tokyo)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'epoch_sp' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/erg/mepe/l2/3dflux/2017/erg_mepe_l2_3dflux_20170323_v01_01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 59.6364% of the 187668 timesteps. Cadence = 250000000 [ns] = PT0.25S.
info.contact: Satoshi Kasahara @ The University of Tokyo

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Time for each spin sector, corresponding to middle of each spin sector
